footer.lab: Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining Laboratory
footer.address: TR-520, No.43, Sec. 4, Keelung Rd., Da-An Dist., Taipei City 106, Taiwan

research.title: Research Topics
research.content: The main research area is Data Mining, which involves extracting various kinds of information from data and transforming it into a knowledge structure that is easy to comprehend and apply.

descriptions.SLUL: Perform supervised or unsupervised learning on data, such as classification or clustering, to find out the patterns of the data, which can help understand the data's features.
descriptions.SMBD: Research on processing high-traffic, real-time, or huge data such as data streaming and big data that traditional algorithms cannot handle.
descriptions.NLP: Analyze the purpose or emotion of the speaker or author through the content of the text.
descriptions.STDM: Use data mining technology to find location, time, route, etc. patterns from datasets containing relevant time and space information.
descriptions.RS: The goal is to select the most suitable items to recommend to the user based on the preferences or needs of different users from many things.
descriptions.SN: The problem of maximizing influence in social networks is to analyze the relationship between user nodes so that messages can be spread or blocked faster and more accurately.
descriptions.AN: Explore applying attention mechanisms in different data types and situations to enhance the model's capture and understanding of key information.
